     Interim CEO Appointment 
      KRN Admin  July 20, 2017     


 


   
 
 
                 July 20, 2017   —   Saskatoon, SK (CNW–July 20, 2017) – Karnalyte Resources Inc.  ( “Karnalyte”  or the “ Company “) ( TSX: KRN ) announced today that the Company’s Board of Directors (the  “Board” ) has appointed Mr. W. Todd Rowan as Interim Chief Executive Officer, effective July 20, 2017. Mr. Rowan will also continue to serve as a member of the Company’s Board.
 The Board is currently undertaking a process to appoint a new permanent Chief Executive Officer of the Company and has engaged an executive search firm to assist in the process. 
 For further information, please contact: 
 Karnalyte Resources Inc. 
1 (306) 986-1486 
info@karnalyte.com 
www.karnalyte.com
